agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the seizure and impoundment of agricultural animals. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and all attachments
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents training required for animal control officers in Virginia. This series may include, but is not limited certificates of completion, class rosters, correspondence, and any attachments.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents completed annual survey responses submitted by local animal control units. This series may but is not limited to: surveys and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents annual animal custody summaries submitted by public and private animal shelters, humane societies, and rescue groups. This series may include, but is limited to: reports and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents livestock import permits that are provided to livestock owners and dealers by the State Veterinarian. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and permits.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the issuance of civil penalty assessments to regulated entities or facilities due to violations found during inspections, including violations of mandated requirements. This series may include, but is not limited to: notices of violation and civil penalty matrices.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: documents all complaints received by the Department from individuals, businesses, government or on behalf of organizations. This series may include, but is limited to: complaint forms, photos, and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents horses that have been tested and treated for Contagious Equine Metritis(CEM). This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and correspondence.
retention_statement: 20 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the investigation of felony animal abuse and neglect. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, photographs, scene sketches, and all attachments.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents dangerous dog information submitted local animal control departments and dangerous dog owners. This series may include, but is not limited to: registration forms and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Equine Infectious Anemia Test (Coggins) The series
series_description: documents testing on equine blood by the or veterinarian to determine whether a horse residing in has tested positive for Equine Infectious Anemia. This series may include, but is not limited to: laboratory test forms and attachments.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Import and Export Certificates of Veterinary Inspection (CVI)
series_description: This series documents the receipt of import and export certificates of veterinary inspection (CVI) for all livestock, domestic, and exotic animals, including poultry and other species. This series may include but is not limited to: and rejection letters.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents letters sent to animal shelters upon an initial inspection and subsequent approval to operate. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspection forms and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: documents laboratory submissions, test results, other information related to tests that are performed in the regional animal health laboratories. This series may include, is not limited to: submission forms, test data, chain of custody forms, photographs, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the yearly inspections by the agency's shelter inspector. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the requests of vaccine companies for approval to distribute their product in the commonwealth, and the approval or denial by the State Veterinarian. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year
